channel.title: [PI]Startup Music NOT SOUNDS
channel.description:
I need a Tutorial on how to make music play at the start of the client (like RS) and thats all. I'm an ok coder, so I don't need that much much explained. I just need to know what code to add and where. So if you would please help
Edit- Still need help guys
